caption.center: Henry A. Christy, appellee, v. Bella C. Brown, appellant.

court.center: Appellate Court of Illinois, Chicago, First District.

opinion.posture:
Bill to compel assignment of certificate of stock and accounting of dividends. Decree for complainant.
Appeal from the Superior Court of Cook county; the Hon. Walter P. Steffen, Judge, presiding. Heard in the first division of this court for the first district at the December term, 1927.
opinion.attorneys: Frederick A. Brown, for appellant; William G. Worthey, of counsel. Newby Murphy, for appellee; John B. King and Robert E. Ward, of counsel.
opinion.opinion_byline: Mr. Justice McSurely delivered the opinion of the court.
